entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
